room_title: Escape room "Nancy Drew - The Mystery of the Missing Jewelry" by Mystery Escape Room in Salt Lake City
room_address: 130 S Rio Grande Street Salt Lake City, UT 84101
room_description: 40 years ago the Evergreen Lodge where Nancy and her father are staying had an unsolved mystery about a valuable jewelry collection owned by a Marie Addison that went missing. The Addisons were staying at the lodge when a fire forced all the guests to leave their rooms. When the Addisons returned they found Marieâ€™s jewelry collection was missing. Though they searched all the guests and staff the collection was never found. Some believe it is still hidden somewhere in the lodge.
